Description:
Tool to enable developers to quickly extract relevant data from production in order to do fault isolation in a development environment.

First version of the tool is done when we can extract enough data to reproduce Nordnet's campaign report (id 24185) locally.
E.g. Max Price and Static Costs

Story: Two report from KR's system that are priority for Jens

Description:
Inventory of our current reports. 
Usage stats, time to execute
Who uses the reports
etc.

Create a baseline database for development use. (To avoid having to copy 50+ GB of data.)

It should include:
- a minimalistic schema definition
- campaign config data setup (possibly using factory girl)
- sql script for z-table setups.
